author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-6165: Change merging APIs from LeafReader to CodecReader

author: aconway
msg: DISPATCH-95: Connector and listener identity does not show address and port.
Previously connectors and listeners were identified using a counter, e.g. "listener/0"
Now they are identified by host and port, e.g. "listener/0.0.0.0:amqp"

author: mxmanghi
msg: * doc/xml/command.xml,directives.xml: add explanation of new command

author: schultz
msg: Remove zero-boundary-check on String length argument, as this argument is unsigned and can therefore never be less than zero.
Removes a compiler warning and simplifies the code a bit.
